prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Proofs of Two Manuscripts by Paul Bowles, 1952 and 1972, Accession # 10501-c, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was transferred to Special Collections on December 30, 1985.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection contains uncorrected pre-publication review proofs of Let It Come Down,1952, and Without Stopping: An Autobiography.

did.unittitle: Uncorrected pre-publication review proof of Paul Bowles' Let It Come Down(New York: Random House), with blue paper cover marked as file copy 1952
Uncorrected pre-publication review proof of Paul Bowles' Without Stopping: An Autobiography(New York: G.P. Putnam's Sons) 1972
